alert.note: Alert for South Fulton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 21 at 2:43PM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Coweta and southwestern Fulton Counties through 315 PM EST ... At 243 PM EST, a strong thunderstorm was near Roscoe, or 10 miles north of Newnan, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... City of South Fulton, Fairburn, Palmetto, Chattahoochee Hills, Dunaway Gardens, Campbellton, and Roscoe. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
